about_the_game:
Unlock the Mysteries of the Bible with Bible Trivia!

Embark on an immersive journey through the biblical universe with our Bible Trivia. In addition to answering questions, you can now chat with Moses, and soon, other historical figures like David and Paul! With over 1,500 questions, new music, and enhanced graphics, this is your chance to explore the stories, parables, and teachings of the Bible in an entirely new way.

Game Highlights:

Chat with Moses: For the first time, you can interact directly with biblical characters and discover even more about their stories and teachings. Soon, other characters will be available to chat with, including Abraham, Paul, Noah, Joseph, and even Jesus!

Star-Based Progression: As you master the questions, collect stars that unlock new Bible passages. Challenge yourself to master each book and deepen your understanding of the Scriptures.

New Languages Added: You can now play in Russian and Spanish, expanding our global community.

Avatar Selection: Personalize your experience by choosing an avatar that matches your style and personality.

Innovative Themed Cards: Discover a gallery of themed cards, bringing to life prophets, kings, priests, and disciples of Christ. Unlock these cards by completing specific sections with accurate answers.

Custom Save System: With three dedicated save slots, you can progress at your own pace, ensuring a personalized and relaxed experience.

Strategies and Challenges: Face more challenging questions with strategic resources like extended time and star multipliers, adding depth and challenge to the game.

Rewards and Recognition: Earn coins for correct answers and achieve significant milestones throughout the game, recognizing your dedication and knowledge.

Bible Immersion: Each question is meticulously organized by book, ensuring an unprecedented educational and spiritual journey. Explore, learn, and connect with the eternal narratives of the Bible, all while enjoying an engaging gameplay experience.

Join the Biblical Adventure: Dive into the rich stories and teachings of the Bible. Bible Trivia is more than a game; it’s a gateway to a spiritually enriching experience. Start your journey today and discover the beauty and depth of the Bible like never before.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel-compatible processor with 1.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card compatible with DirectX 9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel-compatible processor with 2.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with support for OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible sound card
